0.1.name: wordpress/word-of-the-day-widget-by-wordnik
0.1.description:
This plugin shows the latest word of the day from Wordnik.com. Every day your readers will see an interesting word, complete with definition and a real example sentence with attribution.

Wordnik's words of the day are always unique, interesting, and rare. Give your blog readers a little word fun every day with this simple, attractive, and educational plug-in!
